messages: edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (15:06): "unacceptable to many of our corporate customers"

edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (15:07): http://www.w3.org/Bugs/Public/show_bug.cgi?id=11449
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (15:07): another person confusing UI and submission formats
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (15:07): Resolved:Missing the point
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (15:07): "Missing the point" were the exact words I had in mind
1bd0a14e07fd930aee8256e5bc2eb148 (15:08): those imperialist bastards - time to push metric system and ISO dates forward :)
8c2b4111f14335e65753441e04075f2e (15:10): by "contributor"?
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (15:10): I'm going to a front end developer meeting today. It's good to hear what the users of the stuff we spec think.
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (15:11): 8c2b4111f14335e65753441e04075f2e: "contributor" is a generic address for people who haven't logged in
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (15:11): somewhere between now and like three years ago?
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (15:11): at least, haven't seen you around
8c2b4111f14335e65753441e04075f2e (15:11): edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e: lol i have just been lurking :)
8c2b4111f14335e65753441e04075f2e (15:13): not much, just lurking (or i guess, not at the moment) :)
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (15:19): I guess at some point we should have some CSS to control the UI
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (15:19): bug has a point in that browser locale is not really enough
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (15:22): it's still amusing that "unacceptable to our corporate customers" is used as an argument amplifier
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (15:28): yeah, reminds me of the CDF WG
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (15:28): and IBM

edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (15:42): heh, didn't realize it was interactive until now

4d05dc3c4352ebe7593b536f2078cfe9 (15:43): Great Opportunity in Sent is good :)
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (15:45): FW: Love the show
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (15:45): hahaha

b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (15:48): Ah, I hoped the new tab button would work
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (15:49): yeah, was a whee bit disappointed by that too
4d05dc3c4352ebe7593b536f2078cfe9 (15:51): I'm disappointed that there is no "150 million Opera users worldwide" in the Sent folder. It should be there since the out of office reply is in received
4d05dc3c4352ebe7593b536f2078cfe9 (15:52): plus, 8 days to send an out of office reply is weird
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (15:53): hours, you mean?
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (15:54): was the first thing I checked too

4d05dc3c4352ebe7593b536f2078cfe9 (15:55): 9 actually
